http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif DISABILITY-DISASTERS List DISABILITY-DISASTERS List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=DISABILITY-DISASTERS&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=DISABILITY-DISASTERS.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-03-04T15:31:54Z Ilan Kelman 2015-03-04T15:21:42+00:00 2015-03-04T15:21:42+00:00 Children with Disabilities and Disaster Risk Reduction https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISABILITY-DISASTERS;4d83b241.1503 A new paper on "Children with Disabilities and Disaster Risk Reduction" has just been published http://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s13753-015-0042-9 and is freely available for downloading. GAATES - Marnie Peters 2015-01-28T14:33:47-05:00 2015-01-28T14:33:47-05:00 Fire Safety for All - including PWD and People with Activity Limitations https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISABILITY-DISASTERS;9ef2da68.1501 *'Fire Safety for All' in Buildings \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd *<br><http://media.abbeytours.ie/lp/l/539620/d7a6bd440770588d88fe8697d4857636/90027901>*Reboot<br>& Reload !*<br><http://media.abbeytours.ie/lp/l/539620/d7a6bd440770588d88fe8697d4857636/90027901><br><br>While building and fire safety codes and standards exist in almost every<br>country, requirements addressing *Fire Safety for People with Activity<br>Limitations, *if they exist at all, are usually inadequate. This is a very<br>significant obstacle to overall building accessibility.<br><br>Using the UN Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities as the<br>starting point in International Law, this conference will re-examine Fire<br>Safety and Protection in Buildings for People with Activity Limitations. This<br>conference is intended to be a catalyst for substantive social<br>transformation globally. [...] John Twigg 2015-01-28T15:51:47+00:00 2015-01-28T15:51:47+00:00 Including People with Disabilities in Emergency Relief Efforts https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISABILITY-DISASTERS;694af90e.1501 This new briefing paper is really useful<br><br>Oosterhoff, P. and Kett, M.<br>IDS Rapid Response Briefing 8<br>http://www.ids.ac.uk/publication/including-people-with-disabilities-in-emergency-relief-efforts John Twigg 2015-01-22T17:47:42+00:00 2015-01-22T17:47:42+00:00 7th i-Rec conference: Reconstruction and Recovery in Urban Contexts https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISABILITY-DISASTERS;a2fc746c.1501 The deadline for abstracts has been extended to 2 March 2015. Details of the conference are at http://www.bartlett.ucl.ac.uk/dpu/i-rec Thanos Bantis 2014-09-26T11:37:09+01:00 2014-09-26T11:37:09+01:00 Re: Disability and Disaster: Lawsuits Push for Better Emergency Planning https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISABILITY-DISASTERS;701bc54f.1409 Thank you John for this!<br><br>On Fri, Sep 26, 2014 at 11:17 AM, John Twigg <j.twigg@ucl.ac.uk> wrote:<br><br>> Interesting article in the Sept 25th, 2014 issue of the newsletter<br>> Disaster Research on legal challenges in the USA to ensure the needs of<br>> disabled people are met in emergency planning -<br>> http://www.colorado.edu/hazards/dr/<br>> John Twigg 2014-09-26T11:17:03+01:00 2014-09-26T11:17:03+01:00 Disability and Disaster: Lawsuits Push for Better Emergency Planning https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISABILITY-DISASTERS;4217c748.1409 Interesting article in the Sept 25th, 2014 issue of the newsletter Disaster Research on legal challenges in the USA to ensure the needs of disabled people are met in emergency planning - http://www.colorado.edu/hazards/dr/ John Twigg 2014-07-11T12:23:41+01:00 2014-07-11T12:23:41+01:00 change in UK government/DFID's approach to disability, aid and development https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISABILITY-DISASTERS;6832f338.1407 see this Oxfam blog and links<br><br>http://oxfamblogs.org/fp2p/an-important-breakthrough-on-disability-aid-and-development/ GAATES - Marnie Peters 2014-07-02T13:38:24-04:00 2014-07-02T13:38:24-04:00 DEADLINE EXTENDED: Nominate Innovative Practices and Policies on Disability Inclusive Disaster Risk Reduction https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISABILITY-DISASTERS;4580e03c.1407 -<br><br>The Global Alliance on Accessible Technologies and Environments - *GAATES *(<br>www.GAATES.org <http://www.gaates.org/>) in collaboration with the *Zero<br>Project*(www.ZeroProject.org <http://www.zeroproject.org/>) is looking for<br>innovative practices and policies that relate to *Emergency Preparedness<br>and Disability Inclusive Disaster Risk Reduction (DiDRR)*.<br><br>In the Zero Project 2014 Report, which focused on global accessibility, it<br>was noted 'there are particularly dispiriting results on emergency issues:" [...] John Twigg 2014-05-29T18:28:04+01:00 2014-05-29T18:28:04+01:00 rehabilitation after the Haiti earthquake https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DISABILITY-DISASTERS;dc3a42ab.1405 There is an interesting article on this in a recent issue of Humanitarian Exchange:<br><br>http://www.odihpn.org/humanitarian-exchange-magazine/issue-54/the-rehabilitation-response-in-haiti-a-systems-evaluation-approach
